title: ninnuvinA nannu
sahitya:
ninnuvinA nannu brOcEvArevarurA raghuvarA nI padAmbhOjamu nE viDajAla


anupallavi

  pannakAri vAhana pAlita vAraNa patita pAvana vAsydEva pannaga shayana


caraNam    bhUmijA ramaNa nAkenduku nirdaya nI mahimalu nEnEmani pogaDudu 
sama dhananutArchita kAmita dAyaka kamala sambhavAdi ninnE neranammiti
